Similar to Rocket League, there is a lot of in game purchases, but it can be a lot of fun without spending a single extra dollar. It's the kind of game you play for a bit and come back to once in a while.

Some matches are tense and memorable, while some the killer will just be standing around doing nothing swinging his weapon. (I assume people do this to farm xp??) So your experience will be hit and miss, but when it does hit, it's a lot of fun.

诶..屠夫们好啊，我是奥蒙德山度假村掌门人，军团。刚才有个屠夫问我团老师发生肾么事了，我说怎么回事，给我发了几张截图。我一看，嗷！原来是昨天，有两个蔫轻人，三十多岁，一个体重，九十多公斤，一个体重八十多公斤。塔们说，诶...有一个说是，我在小白房修机机子修坏了，团老师你能不能教教我偷电功法，诶…帮助治疗一下，我的爆点病。我说可以。我说你在小白房练死劲儿，不好用，他不服气。诶...我说小朋友，你两个手来折我一个手指头，他折不动。他说你这也没用。我说我这个有用，这是化劲儿，传统偷电是讲化劲儿的，四两啵千金。二百多斤的英国gay卫，都握不动我这一个手指头啊…哈。 他非要和我试试，我说可以。诶…我一说完他啪就站起来了，很快啊！然后上来就是一个翻窗，一个翻板，一个小无敌，我全部防区(口糊)防出去了啊!
防出去以后自然是传统偷电以点到为止，右拳放到他电机上没打他，我笑一下准备收拳，因为这时间，按传统偷电的点到为止，他已经输了。如果这一拳发力，一拳就把他机子打鸪鹧了，放在机子上没有打他，他也承认，我先打到他电机。他不知道拳放在他机子上，他承认我先打到他电机，啊！我收拳的时间不打了，他突然袭击，毁灭打击来打我脸，啊。我大意了啊，没有闪，诶…他的手电给我眼，啊，右眼，蹭了一下，但没关系啊！他也说，啊他截图也说了，两分多钟以后，当时流眼泪了，捂着眼，我说嗷嗷。然后两分钟以后，两分多钟以后啊就好啦。我说小伙子你不讲武德你不懂，他说团老师对不起对不起，我不懂规矩。啊，他说他是乱打的，他可不是乱打的啊！翻窗，翻板，小无敌，训练有素，后来他说他练过三四年打击，啊，看来是，有～备而来!
这两个蔫轻人不讲武德，来，骗！来，偷袭！我十九岁的小同志。这好吗？这不好！
我劝！这位年轻人，耗子尾汁，耗耗反思，以后不要再犯这样的聪明，小聪明啊！呃…农场要以和为贵，要讲武德，不要搞，窝里斗。谢谢屠夫们!

Oyunda hem kurbanlar için hem de katiller için karakter seçenekleri bulunmakta. Katillerden Trapper yere kapanlar kurabiliyorken Wraith görünmez olabiliyor, Hillbilly testere kullanıyor, The Nurse ise kısa bir mesafe ışınlanabiliyor vs.vs. Diğer karakterleri açmak için ise DLC’lerden satın almanız gerekiyor.

Ayrıca oyundaki yetenek ağacı sayesinde oyuna girdiğinizde ekstra avantajlar elde edebiliyorsunuz. Oyuna ilk yardım çantası, el feneri gibi eşyalarla başlayabilirsiniz veya çeşitli yetenekler elde edebilirsiniz (Çıkış kapısı açıldığında daha hızlı koşma, daha hızlı iyileşme gibi.).


Oyunun matchmaking sistemi ise biraz sorunlu. Lobby açıp başka insanların girmesini bekliyorsunuz.Bunlara rağmen arkadaşlarınızla sıkıldığınızda hep beraber girip çok güzel vakit geçirebileceğiniz bir oyun.

- Camperların anasını s*keyim.

Grafikler gerçekten güzel. Oynanışda gayet zevkli. Oyunda genel amacımız katil yada kurban olarak oynayıp kaçmaya yada öldürmeye çalışıyoruz. Hem Single hemde Co op olarak oldukca zevkli oluyor. Bir sürü karakter ve geliştirmeleri var ve her birinin özelliği olayı farklı. Görevler hikayeleri falan derken baya geniş bir oyun kendisi. Korku filmlerinden bir çok bilindik karkaterde var. Ne diyebilirimki herşey ortada zaten gayet güzel bir oyun verdiğiniz paranın tamamını karşılıyor bence ^^

Artıları ;

+ Grafikler güzel
+ Oynanış oldukca iyi
+ Yetenekler hoş duruyor
+ Geniş bir oyun
+ Karakterler ve Geliştirmeleri var her biri için
+ Hem Coop hemde Single oynarken zevk alıyorsunuz

Eksilerine yada eksiklerine gelecek olursak;

- Korku ve kan unsurları herkese hitap etmeyebilir
- Bazen lag ve takılmalar oluyor

Daha detaylı olarak İlk Bakış videomdan görebilirsiniz.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w-lUs_S6rpI

Świetna gra dla oderwania się od codzienności.. Jak znudziły się komuś strzelanie do innych, to polecam pouciekać przed zabójcą. W grze musimy naprawić 5 generatorów aby uruchomiły się bramy do ucieczki z mapy. W trakcie rozgrywki przeszkadza nam zabójca, którego celem jest niepozwolenie w ucieczce i naprawie generatorów. Oprócz tego możemy także wykonywać różne interakcje, które mają wpływ na rozgrywkę, jak na przykład zniszczenie totemów zabójcy z klątwami (klątwy utrudniają nam w różnych interakcjach). Gra ma klimat. Polecam!

I'd like to start by saying, as it stands in it's current form in Dec 2020, Dead by Daylight is an unbalanced game that favours the survivor class over the killer class.

I've played against plenty of entitled survivors rage quitting because the game isn't going their way. I have never once experienced a killer rage quitting. I'm sure it happens but it hasn't to me. The amount of BS killers go through compared to survivors is unreal. Entire parties Tee bagging on the finishing line, lobbies of friends all communicating and running meta to **** all over the killers day, body blocking and the aforementioned disconnecting are only some of the **** killers get to deal with dozens of times a night. 
What have survivors got to be upset about? Sucking and getting killed. Blood warden is always a brutal turn when it works too but its situational and fair.
Yeah its tough on both sides. Wanna win as the killer? Play like a god or pull a pink skull out of your ***. Wanna win as a survivor? Run dead hard, decisive strike, unbreakable and borrowed time and win without trying. But no one will be impressed when you do.
Dead hard, decisive strike, unbreakable and borrowed time are the meta perks for survivors. Most survivors run them or are actively specking towards them, and they come in handy EVERY MATCH without exception. They are broken, nerf them.

This game has limitless potential and I will keep playing since I already own the game but I would not recommend the reader joining me and buying the game. Not until the developers try playing a couple rounds at high rank as the killer so they can see how truly broken their game and community actually are.
Просто представьте, что вы залезли в соседский огород и стащили из сарая ящик самогона, убежали в лес с тремя своими друзьями, а за вами гоняется дед с бензопилой
This game has shown and put me through things worse then death

My masochism allows me to love being chased, hooked and tunnelled and stepped on by Daddy Blight, though I'll still run away screaming to give Daddy Blight the thrill of the hunt before I scare it off by turning around blushing and saying "owo Daddy Blight please step on me hard."

Being serious when playing as survivor the best experience is when playing with friends because when you solo queue it makes it more likely you'll get people who lead the killer straight to you (most of the time by accident as no coms, but sometimes they do it on purpose to troll or to try to get the killer off of them) which is a pain in the ass if you're trying to not 3 gen the team and trying to get a certain generator done to stop that from happening. So if you have 3 more people to play with I recommend playing survivor games with them for optimal communication if you're looking to win matches, though it's also fun to just ♥♥♥♥ around with friends and meme around, a 4th friend to have 5 people for customs is also really fun because customs allows you to try out all the perks the game has to offer so it's fun to play around with those in customs with friends.

Now if you're on your own I do recommend playing killer more frequently than survivor (unless if you're a masochist like me... uh well, sometimes you need to be a masochist to play as killer too haha) as you don't have a team you need to worry about. Your goal is to apply pressure on the generators, down and hook survivors (don't tunnel though otherwise you're asking for decisive strike to plough you down into the earth, as well as other anti tunnelling perks that'll make your life hell if survivors have half a mind to run them lmao, and tunnelling is usually seen as a toxic behaviour so unless you want to be flamed in after match chat don't do it lol) to sacrifice to the entity. You get points for damaging gens, pallets and breakable doors too, but don't go too crazy with breaking doors as those can sometimes be used in your favour to trap a survivor. There are quite a few killers to choose from all with their own unique abilities, my favourites lean towards the stealth killers such as Pig, Ghost Face and Myers, but killers like Legion, Toxic Bubba and Spirit can be really fun to play as at times. It depends on your play style :) The game can get really frustrating at times while playing as killer so be sure to take breaks if you get stressed easily, as any survivor who can loop really well can get you in a bind if you're new to the game (and hell even after 177 hours I still sometimes have trouble breaking loops as killer.) Survivors will bring toolboxes to gen rush, they will bring medkits to heal themselves and each other, they will bring keys to escape through hatch when it spawns, they will bring flashlights that will piss you off so much, but remember it is an online game and people are competitive so if you're playing casually brush off games you get with those kinds of players and just keep having fun. Oh and don't be a ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ and camp. If you're camping you are actually asking to get your ass handed to you lmao.

It is a solid game but it does have its problems though I still recommend it. Play it with friends (again unless if you're a masochist) and have some fun. There are definitely better games out there, but this is a good one, though the addiction of trying to get over the frustration it can cause is real haha.

Finishing this off, Daddy Blight mains, I love you, Blight scares the crap out of me, but feel free to step on me hard any day ;3 <3
